meta.name: LinkedIn to Gmail: Generate Cold Emails with Dumpling AI, GPT-4 & Dropcontact

name: Generate Cold Email from LinkedIn Profile with Dumpling AI and GPT-4

values.content:
=You are an expert cold email copywriter for a digital marketing agency called BrightPath Digital. Your task is to take the lead details provided and generate two things: 1. A personalized subject line that feels relevant to them and sparks curiosity, no longer than eight words. 2. A short cold email of four to six sentences in HTML that starts with a natural ice breaker about them or their company, introduces BrightPath Digital‚Äôs services, highlights how we help businesses grow through increased visibility and qualified leads and better campaign performance, and ends with a light call to action. The email must always end with the signature block shown below. Guidelines: Use the lead‚Äôs name in the greeting. Connect the ice breaker directly to the company description so it feels tailored. Keep the tone professional, warm, and human. Avoid buzzwords and robotic phrases. Write in clear simple English. Keep the total email under one hundred and twenty words. Always include this exact signature block at the end of the HTML:

Best regards,
BrightPath Digital

Output must be strict JSON with no extra text. Return exactly this structure: { "subject": "Personalized subject line here", "email": "

Greeting that uses the lead‚Äôs name.

Ice breaker tied to the company description.

Brief introduction of BrightPath Digital and how we help.

Simple call to action asking for a quick chat.

Best regards,
BrightPath Digital

" }

parameters.content:
## ‚úâÔ∏è Generate and Send Cold Email from LinkedIn Profile with AI

This workflow turns a submitted LinkedIn profile into a cold email in seconds.

1. Trigger: LinkedIn URL submitted via web form  
2. Dumpling AI fetches company data  
3. Dropcontact enriches with name/email  
4. GPT-4 writes a cold email and subject line  
5. Gmail sends the email  
6. Airtable logs the lead

‚úÖ Required: Dumpling AI, Dropcontact, OpenAI, Gmail, Airtable credentials  
‚úÖ Outputs are structured and ready-to-use

json.name: Schneider Electric

posts.text:
Earlier this year, we had the honor to be named Most Sustainable Company by Corporate Knights for the second time, a first for any company. Adding to this, a couple of months ago we were also recognized again by TIME Magazine & Statista, for the second time.

We‚Äôve asked our EVP France Operations, Laurent Bataille : ‚ÄúWhat does it take to become the world‚Äôs most sustainable company?‚Äù For him, sustainability is a long-term adventure.

For more than 20 years, sustainability has guided our choices and shaped our strategy. ‚ÄúI think that behind this success lies a cultural aspect,‚Äù says Laurent. At Schneider Electric we have a real understanding of the effect we have on our ecosystems and stakeholders. ‚ÄúWe are both a solution provider and diligent in-house practitioner,‚Äù he adds.

Digitalization, AI, climate change, energy transition, the evolution of global wealth and balance‚Ä¶ these are our next frontiers. So many challenges, so many opportunities to continue to grow, innovate, and make an impact.

Join us on this journey. Learn more about becoming an #ImpactCompany: http://spr.ly/6009AzPqx

In our journey to drive growth with purpose, we‚Äôre rethinking how technology can serve both business and the planet. üåç

The United Nations Global Compact‚Äôs CMO Blueprint for Sustainable Growth highlights the pivotal role CMOs play in aligning strategy with the SDGs to deliver meaningful impact. At Schneider Electric, we believe marketing plays a big part in driving adoption of sustainable innovation.

Take our AirSeT medium-voltage switchgear: it replaces SF‚ÇÜ ‚Äì a potent greenhouse gas ‚Äì with pure air, delivering the same high performance with significantly lower environmental impact. Each installation avoids 75,000 kg of CO‚ÇÇe emissions and offers up to 30% savings in maintenance costs.

To accelerate adoption, marketing must:
‚úÖ Make sustainability core to growth for business and society
‚úÖ Build purposeful brands on real action to earn lasting trust
‚úÖ Drive innovation that meets regulations and advances sustainability
‚úÖ Communicate clearly and inclusively, backed by data, to inspire change
‚úÖ Partner strategically to amplify impact across industries

Dive into our story and other sustainable marketing strategies: http://spr.ly/6045AZbVH

#SustainableGrowth #CMOBlueprint #MarketingWithPurpose #ImpactCompany

Accelerate AI data center deployment with our Prefabricated Modular EcoStruxure‚Ñ¢ Pod Data Center.

Engineered for speed, scalability, and flexibility, it supports up to 42 high-density racks per pod with hybrid liquid-air cooling. Preconfigured and factory-tested, it ensures predictable performance, reduced CapEx, and rapid time-to-market‚Äîideal for hyperscale, cloud, and AI-driven environments.

Explore our 3D Sketchfab model to learn more: http://spr.ly/6049AKqSH

#DataCentersoftheFuture #EcoStruxurePod

Unlock industrial success with quality-first strategies.

Digital transformation and quality management can reveal hidden costs, boost efficiency, and build resilience.

Explore Schneider Electric‚Äôs eGuide for smarter quality management http://spr.ly/6041Aw5iF #DigitalTransformation

What makes India a magnet for global leadership and innovation?

In this video, three of our leaders share their perspectives on India as a growth hub‚Äîcapturing the spirit of transformation, opportunity, and purpose that defines the India experience.

From dynamic markets to a thriving talent ecosystem, discover why India is the place to build, lead, and grow.

Ready to be part of the India Talent Quest? Register now: http://spr.ly/6046f5niK #ImpactStartsWithUs

AI training gets the headlines, but inference is where the real value lies.

Once models are trained, running them efficiently on new data is what drives automation, insights, and business impact.

The challenge? Many inference workloads still run on oversized training clusters‚Äîlike using 800 GPUs when 8 would do.

As AI adoption grows, the winners will be those who optimize inference by cutting costs, right-sizing infrastructure, and scaling sustainably: http://spr.ly/6001ApwJz

#EnergyEfficiency

We are proud to announce that Schneider Electric has been recognized on the Fortune 2025 Change the World List üéâ
This honor celebrates our commitment to protecting the environment and creating a positive social impact through our innovative and sustainable practices.
We remain dedicated to making meaningful impact for people and the planet. Explore the full list here: http://spr.ly/6049Aw03W

Innovation is at the heart of sustainability. Farrukh Shad, Head of Sustainability Business, APAC & MEA, explains at Bloomberg‚Äôs Sustainable Business Summit Singapore how we leverages AI and data to turn sustainability from a reporting exercise into a strategic advantage.

Watch here: http://spr.ly/6003AwN0F

#Innovation #Sustainability #AI

Electric mobility is accelerating and so are we.

We‚Äôve just launched a dedicated page showcasing our fast charging solutions for electric vehicles, designed to meet the needs of residential, commercial, and fleet environments.

What you‚Äôll find:
- Reliable AC and DC charging technologies
- Smart energy management for cost and performance optimization
- Seamless integration with energy storage and management systems
- Full compliance with international safety standards

This new resource is built for mobility players looking to scale their energy transition with robust and future-ready solutions.

‚û°Ô∏è Explore the page here: http://spr.ly/6043AkMaT

#LifeIsOn

Copenhagen inspires bold thinking and breakthrough ideas. Connect with the minds driving meaningful transformation at Innovation Summit, October 22‚Äì23. http://spr.ly/6043Aw59l

#InnovationSummit2025

json.description:
Schneider‚Äôs purpose is to create Impact by empowering all to make the most of our energy and resources, bridging progress and sustainability. At Schneider, we call this Life Is On.

Our mission is to be the trusted partner in Sustainability and Efficiency.

We are a global industrial technology leader bringing world-leading expertise in electrification, automation and digitization to smart industries, resilient infrastructure, future-proof data centers, intelligent buildings, and intuitive homes. Anchored by our deep domain expertise, we provide integrated end-to-end lifecycle AI enabled Industrial IoT solutions with connected products, automation, software and services, delivering digital twins to enable profitable growth for our customers.

We are a people company with an ecosystem of 168,000 colleagues and more than a million partners operating in over 100 countries to ensure proximity to our customers and stakeholders. We embrace diversity and inclusion in everything we do, guided by our meaningful purpose of a sustainable future for all.
